physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Both affected members from family I (AII-1 and AII-2) had a small goiter. Goiter was of moderate size in the index case of family II (BII-1) and her mother (BI-3), who had a subtotal thyroidectomy in the past. Both families tested positive for the perchlorate discharge test.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Goiter size in family II increased, leading to surgical intervention for the mother (BI-3) due to its progressive enlargement.
